description:
Rangiku saves a young soul named Shota from being attacked by a Mock Arrancar. Believing this to be Aizen`s doing, Captain Hitsugaya decides to hold off on Shota`s soul burial to further investigate the situation. Meanwhile, the Mock Arrancar has returned and seems to be multiplying.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La descente en piquée du sombre émissaire: le mal se propage !
Maiorita Yami no Shisha! Zoushokusuru Akui
Swooping Descent of the Dark Emissary! The Propagation of Malice
舞い降りた闇の使者! 増殖する悪意
